import React from "react"; import "./Newsfeed.css" import LandingPageNavbar from "components/LandingPageNavbar"; import { List, Text, Img, Button, Line } from "components"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faShareAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const NewsfeedPage = () => { return ( <>

Exercitation veniam consequat sunt nostrud amet. Wemet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Velit officia consequat duis enim velit mollit.
